label: Seal
comment: A device used to secure an object and protect from unauthorized entry or tampering such as a seal affixed to a piece of transport equipment.

datatypeProperties.comment: A unique identifier for this logistics seal.
The code specifying the role of the party responsible for the sealing of this logistics seal.
The maximum unique identifier used for these logistics seals.
A code specifying a condition of this logistics seal.
The code specifying the type of logistics seal.

objectProperties.comment: The party issuing this logistics seal.

referencedBy.comment: A seal required by this cross-border regulatory procedure.
